item.title: Weekly Review #28 - Mastodon, Hometown, and Hide-and-Seek Cat
item.description: 'Here After Us - Mayday' Preface This is a record and reflection of my life from 2023-01-23 to 2023-01-31. I spent most of this week in my hometown, making up for some regrets, simple yet precious. After returning to Hangzhou, I stayed an extra day to meet friends, then hurried back to Beijing from Hangzhou. Upon arriving home in Beijing, I immediately went to pick up Nini from my colleague’s house after barely putting down my luggage.
